name: Lakeside walk at Stowe Gardens, Stowe

ai.summary: A 10.2 km moderate lakeside circuit around Stowe Gardens, offering tranquil water views and varied scenery through formal gardens and woodland near Stowe, UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained gravel and grassy paths with gentle rises. Some sections run close to the water and can be damp or muddy after rain. Bring sturdy footwear and be prepared for shaded woodland and exposed lakeside portions.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly; check forecast. Stay on marked paths and supervise children around water features. Wear sturdy walking shoes, bring water, and carry a light waterproof layer. Let someone know your route and carry a charged phone for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Map, GPS device, or offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn for pleasant temperatures and colored scenery; summer for longer daylight; winter can be muddy and less comfortable.

seo.meta_description: Explore the 10.2 km Lakeside Walk at Stowe Gardens in Stowe, UK. A moderate lakeside trail around tranquil waters with gardens and woodland scenery.
